## isNull() function

检查值value是否为null

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isNull(value: unknown): value is null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

value is null

如果value等于null类型,那么返回true,否则返回false
